author: Tristan Bennett
brief description: Detects the usage of a stored procedure to write keys to the local Windows Registry. Using this stored procedure an attacker can change registry keys that may allow for further abuse such as the WDigest setting for abusing LSASS.
csc control: Critical Security Control #6: Maintenance, Monitoring, and Analysis of Audit Logs

log source details.log source criteria: Include Log Sources from the Selected Lists
